11  template< class XThisType, class XParentOne = void, class XParentTwo = void, class XParentThree = void >
12  class KSComponentTemplate;
13

15  //1-parent component
16  //******************
17 
18  template< class XThisType, class XFirstParentType >
19  class KSComponentTemplate< XThisType, XFirstParentType, void, void > :
20  virtual public KSComponent,
21  public XFirstParentType
22  {
23  public:
24  KSComponentTemplate()
25  {
26  Set( static_cast< XThisType* >( this ) );
27  }
28  virtual ~KSComponentTemplate()
29  {
30  }
31 
32  //***********
33  //KSComponent
34  //***********
35 
36  public:
37  KSComponent* Component( const std::string& aField )
38  {
39  objctmsg_debug( "component <" << this->GetName() << "> building output named <" << aField << ">" << eom )
40  KSComponent* tComponent = KSDictionary< XThisType >::GetComponent( this, aField );
41  if( tComponent == NULL )
42  {
43  return XFirstParentType::Component( aField );
44  }
45  else
46  {
47  fChildComponents.push_back( tComponent );
48  return tComponent;
49  }
50  }
51  KSCommand* Command( const std::string& aField, KSComponent* aChild )
52  {
53  objctmsg_debug( "component <" << this->GetName() << "> building command named <" << aField << ">" << eom )
54  KSCommand* tCommand = KSDictionary< XThisType >::GetCommand( this, aChild, aField );
55  if( tCommand == NULL )
56  {
57  return XFirstParentType::Command( aField, aChild );
58  }
59  else
60  {
61  return tCommand;
62  }
63  }
64  };
65

70  template< class XThisType >
71  class KSComponentTemplate< XThisType, void, void, void > :
72  virtual public KSComponent
73  {
74  public:
75  KSComponentTemplate() :
76  KSComponent()
77  {
78  Set( static_cast< XThisType* >( this ) );
79  }
80  virtual ~KSComponentTemplate()
81  {
82  }
83 
84  //***********
85  //KSComponent
86  //***********
87 
88  public:
89  KSComponent* Component( const std::string& aLabel )
90  {
91  objctmsg_debug( "component <" << this->GetName() << "> building component named <" << aLabel << ">" << eom )
92  KSComponent* tComponent = KSDictionary< XThisType >::GetComponent( this, aLabel );
93  if( tComponent == NULL )
94  {
95  objctmsg( eError ) << "component <" << this->GetName() << "> has no component named <" << aLabel << ">" << eom;
96  return NULL;
97  }
98  else
99  {
100  fChildComponents.push_back( tComponent );
101  return tComponent;
102  }
103  }
104  KSCommand* Command( const std::string& aField, KSComponent* aChild )
105  {
106  objctmsg_debug( "component <" << this->GetName() << "> building command named <" << aField << ">" << eom )
107  KSCommand* tCommand = KSDictionary< XThisType >::GetCommand( this, aChild, aField );
108  if( tCommand == NULL )
109  {
110  objctmsg( eError ) << "component <" << this->GetName() << "> has no command named <" << aField << ">" << eom;
111  return NULL;
112  }
113  else
114  {
115  return tCommand;
116  }
117  }
118  };
119 
120 }
